Name: Green Enchanter Robe
Description: An elegant robe imbued with mystical forces, favored by spellcasters for its arcane enhancements.

Name: Green Defender Tunic
Description: A sturdy tunic, crafted to provide enhanced protection for the wearer against physical onslaughts.

Name: Green Wanderer Robe
Description: A lightweight and comfortable robe, designed for the intrepid explorers who traverse dangerous paths.

Name: Green Noble Tunic
Description: A luxurious tunic befitting of nobility, meticulously woven with an eye for detail and splendor.

Name: Green Templar Robe
Description: A ceremonial robe worn by revered templars, granting divine protection from arcane threats.

Name: Green Kimono
Description: A traditional green kimono, emanating a sense of tranquility and grace, favored in the eastern lands.

Name: Green Warlord Tunic
Description: A battle-tested tunic, born in the fires of countless conflicts, providing unmatched sturdiness and resilience.

Name: Green Sage Robe
Description: A venerable robe adorned by wise sages, enhancing one's grasp over arcane energies.

Name: Fur Pelt
Description: A rugged fur pelt, offering warmth and protection from the harsh wilderness, perfect for survivalists.

Name: Winged Demon
Description: A menacing ensemble resembling a winged demon, imbued with a sinister aura that amplifies magic prowess.

Name: Green Dragoon Tunic
Description: Forged for the mightiest of warriors, this impressive tunic inspires awe and admiration on the battlefield.

Name: Green Bard Robe
Description: A vibrant robe, artfully designed for wandering bards who win both hearts and battles with their charm.

Name: Green Knight Tunic
Description: A trusted tunic for honorable knights, forged with unparalleled craftsmanship and unyielding determination.

Name: Green Guardian Armor
Description: A sturdy armor with verdant hues, forged to protect its wearer from even the fiercest of adversaries.

Name: Green Mystic Armor
Description: An enchanted armor, glistening with magical aura, providing protection against both physical and arcane threats.

Name: Green Royal Armor
Description: A regal armor, worthy of royalty, with intricate detailing and exceptional craftsmanship for unmatched resilience.

Name: Green Warden Armor
Description: A rugged armor designed to withstand the unforgiving elements, allowing its wearer to stand stalwart in times of need.

Name: Green Blademaster Armor
Description: A deft very light armor worn by master swordsmen, allowing swift movements and devastating blows in combat.
